Posts.Content: May 31, 2019 02:14AM Sea1951 wrote: i was diagnosed with bc in april of this year. I have had a port placed and a Lumpectomy scheduled June 27. Chemo and radiation to follow. I am 68. Guess I can be the granny of you all.
Posts.Title: Would you mind sharing your age at time of diagnosis? ByFaith Gussy
